meanings.definition: An unbroken view of the whole region surrounding an observer.
meanings.sent1: The mountaintop offered breathtaking panoramas of the valley below.
meanings.sent2: She captured the beautiful panorama of the city skyline in her painting.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel enjoyed the panorama of the park from the tree.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a vast panorama of memories, each one vivid and distinct.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes recreated the panorama of the ocean at sunset.

meanings.definition: A picture or photograph containing a wide view.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a stunning panorama of the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The photographer took a panorama of the entire beach at sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the panorama hanging on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her smile captured in the panorama was like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The panorama on the postcard made him long for a vacation by the sea.

meanings.sent1: The report provided a detailed panorama of the market trends.
meanings.sent2: The book offered a panorama of the history of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The student's presentation was a humorous panorama of famous inventions.
meanings.sent4: Her speech painted a panorama of hope for a better future.
meanings.sent5: The documentary gave a vivid panorama of life in the jungle.
